Control Name: Operates Independently—The board of directors has sufficient members who are independent from management and objective in evaluations and decision making.

control_attributes.Control: Operates Independently—The board of directors has sufficient members who are independent from management and objective in evaluations and decision making.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC1.2 COSO Principle 2: The board of directors demonstrates independence from management and exercises oversight of the development and performance of internal control.
